title: Mediterranean Fourplex
neighborhood: Los Angeles, Beverly Hills and  Beverlywood
map_address: 1131 S. Rexford Dr near Pico & Beverly Drive
posting_body: This Mediterranean fourplex unit has 2b/2b and is located in a prime Location!
just east of Beverly Drive, this property is located just one mile from Rodeo Dr. and Wilshire Blvd., making it within walking distance to the best shopping in the area.
The complex was originally built in 1930, and was completely remodeled in early 2009.

Each unit has stainless steel Kitchen Aid appliances (stove, refrigerator, and dishwasher), double stacked washer and dryer in each unit, new A/C units, hardwood flooring throughout, with venetian plaster walls, exposed beams and recessed lighting in the living room and bedrooms, Private balcony with French doors.
jacuzzi tubs in both bathrooms with marble floors.
There is a four car covered garage (ONE parking spot per unit).
The location is fully secured with gates around the entire property.
- This location is great for those who need to be close to work, the property is within a few miles of the high-rise offices in Century City and Downtown LA.
For students who attend UCLA, Mount Saint Mary’s, USC and other prominent Los Angeles Universities, they have a short commute as well.
The street itself is beautiful, clean and is lined with well-maintained agriculture.
The neighborhood is an attractive and safe place for future tenants.
This unit will be available  August 15th applications are now being accepted.
Private showings are by APPOINTMENT  ONLY!
